title: The king of Denmark is waving a yellow star.
subtitle: The myth of non-Jewish Danes who donate yellow stars in solidarity with Jews during the Nazi occupation of Denmark is an impressive but historically inaccurate story.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: When the Germans in occupied Denmark ordered the Jews to identify themselves by wearing armbands with yellow stars during World War II, the tenth Christian King of Denmark and non-Jewish Danes foiled the regime.
